TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BasicDesignerLoader extends System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerLoader implements class System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService
Public MustInherit Class BasicDesignerLoader Inherits DesignerLoader Implements IDesignerLoaderService
type BasicDesignerLoader = class inherit DesignerLoader interface IDesignerLoaderService

summary.span: 提供 接口的实现。

span.span: Provides an implementation of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是设计器加载程序的完整实现，无需任何与持久性格式相关的内容。A is a complete implementation of a designer loader without anything relating to a persistence format. 不要求文本或二进制持久性，但它确实支持以下功能：A does not dictate either a text or binary persistence, but it does support the following features: - 多个负载依赖项。Multiple load dependencies. - 跟踪设计器中的更改。Tracking changes within the designer. - 延迟的空闲时重新加载。Deferred idle-time reloading. 将两种类型的服务添加到设计器宿主的服务容器：可替换的服务和不可替代的服务。A adds two kinds of services to the designer host's service container: replaceable services and irreplaceable services. 可以通过更改受保护的 属性的值来替换可替换服务。You can replace a replaceable service by changing the value of the protected property. 不能替换不可替代的服务，因为它们的实现彼此依赖。You cannot replace irreplaceable services because their implementations depend on each other. 下表介绍了默认情况下提供的服务。The following table describes the services that are provided by default. |默认服务Default Service|说明Description| |---------------------|-----------------| ||允许对象请求设计器在处于空闲状态时重新加载自身。Allows objects to request that the designer reload itself when it is idle. 这是一种可替换服务。This is a replaceable service.| ||用于对对象进行序列化和反序列化。Used to serialize and deserialize objects. 序列化管理器作为服务添加，因此需要执行序列化的对象可以利用已添加到序列化管理器的任何序列化提供程序。The serialization manager is added as a service so objects that need to perform serialization can utilize any serialization providers that were added to the serialization manager. 这是一种不可替代的服务。This is an irreplaceable service.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是抽象 方法的实现。This is an implementation of the abstract method. 您无需在自己的类中重写此方法。You do not need to override this method in your own class. 方法执行以下操作：The method performs the following actions: - 它验证设计图面是否已加载。It verifies that the design surface has not already loaded. - 第一次调用时，它会添加相关服务并调用 方法。On the first call, it adds relevant services and calls the method. - 它调用 、和 方法。It calls the , , and methods. 如果尚未从服务容器中移除设计器加载程序服务， 将调用 和 方法，而不是 和 方法。If the designer loader service has not been removed from the service container, will call the and methods instead of the and methods. 在这种情况下，设计器加载程序服务负责调用 和 。In this situation, it is the responsibility of the designer loader service to call and .

span.span: is .

exception.span: 设计器已经加载，或者已经使用其他设计器加载程序宿主调用了 。

span.span: The designer is already loaded, or has been called with a different designer loader host.
has been disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 释放 使用的资源。

span.span: Releases the resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 方法不会刷新对设计器加载程序所做的更改。Calling the method does not flush changes to the designer loader. 如果要保存更改，请在调用 之前调用 。If you want changes to be saved, call before calling . 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用 后，必须释放对 的所有引用，以便垃圾回收器可以回收 占用的内存。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设计器加载程序尚未加载或未标记为已修改，则 方法会立即返回。If the designer loader has not been loaded or has not been marked as modified, the method returns immediately. 否则， 会要求序列化管理器创建序列化会话，然后调用 。Otherwise, asks the serialization manager to create a serialization session and then calls .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 第一次调用 时调用 方法。The method is called the first time is invoked. 此时，你可以向设计器加载程序宿主添加任何所需的服务。You can add any services necessary to the designer loader host at this time. 基实现添加了 提供的服务，因此在调用基实现后，可以替换现有的服务。The base implementation adds services that provides, so after calling the base implementation you may replace existing services. 必须通过重写 来删除此处添加的任何自定义服务。You must remove any custom services you add here by overriding .

summary.span: 指示是否应该重新加载设计器。

span.span: Indicates whether the designer should be reloaded.

returns.span: 如果应重新加载设计器，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the designer should be reloaded; otherwise, .
The default implementation always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些设计器加载程序使用 方法来优化重新加载。The method is used by some designer loaders to optimize reloading. 如果设计器加载程序支持智能重装，则可以重写此方法。This method can be overridden if your designer loader supports intelligent reloading. 某些设计器加载器可以检测到对其基础文档所做的更改，并确定是否确实需要重新加载设计器。Some designer loaders can detect changes made to their underlying document and determine if a reload of the designer is actually necessary. 否则，应从此方法返回 `false`。If not, they should return `false` from this method. 默认实现始终返回 `true`，指示对 的任何调用都将成功。The default implementation always returns `true`, indicating that any call to will succeed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnBeginLoad() cil managed
abstract member OnBeginLoad : unit -> unit override this.OnBeginLoad : unit -> unit

summary.span: 通知设计器加载程序加载即将开始。

span.span: Notifies the designer loader that loading is about to begin.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 方法来启动加载过程。The method is invoked to start the loading process. 此时应执行任何所需的初始化，以便进行加载。You should perform any necessary initialization for loading at this time. 不应使用此方法来执行实际负载。This method should not be used to perform the actual load. 默认实现将禁用更改通知并设置用于加载的 。The default implementation disables change notifications and sets up the for loading. 如果实现 以提供从属负载支持，则应在发生第一个从属加载时调用 。If you implement to provide dependent load support, you should call when the first dependent load occurs. 在最后一次调用 方法后调用 方法。Call the method after the last call to the method. 默认情况下， 实现 并执行此功能。By default, implements and does this for you. 如果调用 时 不可用， 将直接调用 。If is not available when is called, will directly call . 如果提供自己的加载程序服务，或者选择不提供加载程序服务，则需要负责调用此方法。If you provide your own loader service, or if you choose not to provide a loader service, you are responsible for calling this method. 如果 可用，则 方法会通过调用 来间接地调用此方法，如果不是，则直接调用。The method will automatically call this, either indirectly by calling if is available, or directly if it is not.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnBeginUnload() cil managed
abstract member OnBeginUnload : unit -> unit override this.OnBeginUnload : unit -> unit

summary.span: 通知设计器加载程序卸载即将开始。

span.span: Notifies the designer loader that unloading is about to begin.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设计器加载程序要卸载文档时，将调用 方法。The method is invoked when the designer loader is about to unload the document. 该文档可能会卸载以准备重新加载，或者文档未能加载。The document may be unloaded in preparation for reloading, or if the document failed to load. 如果 或 中添加了特定于文档的服务，请将其删除。If you added document-specific services in or , remove them here.

param.name: successful
param.span: 如果已成功地完成了加载，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the load completed successfully; otherwise, .

span.span: An containing objects (usually exceptions) that were reported as errors.

summary.span: 通知设计器加载程序加载已完成。

span.span: Notifies the designer loader that loading is complete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 加载完成后，将调用 方法。The method is invoked when loading is finished. 即使在加载过程中引发了异常，也始终会调用它。It is always called, even if an exception is thrown during loading. 如果加载成功，则 `successful` 的值将设置为 `true`; 如果发生错误，则设置为 `false`。The value of `successful` will be set to `true` if the load succeeded, or `false` if a fatal error occurred. `errors` 集合将包含已报告为错误的对象。The `errors` collection will contain objects that were reported as errors. 通常，这些对象是异常。Usually, these objects are exceptions. 如果实现 以提供从属加载支持，则应在对 方法的最后一次调用之后调用 方法。If you implement to provide dependent load support, you should call the method after the last call to the method. 默认情况下， 实现 并执行此功能。By default, implements and does this for you. 如果调用 时 不可用， 将在调用 后直接调用 。If is not available when is called, will directly call after calling . 此方法应由设计器加载程序服务在所有依赖加载完成时调用。This method should be called by the designer loader service when all dependent loads have been completed. 这将停止由 方法启动的加载过程。This stops the loading process that was initiated by the method. 如果提供自己的加载程序服务，或者选择不提供加载程序服务，则需要负责调用此方法。If you provide your own loader service, or if you choose not to provide a loader service, you are responsible for calling this method. 如果 可用，则 方法会通过调用 方法来间接调用此方法，如果不是，则直接调用。The method will automatically call this, either indirectly by calling the method if is available, or directly if it is not.

span.span: The has not been initialized.
The has been disposed.

summary.span: 通知设计器加载程序即将修改文档的状态。

span.span: Notifies the designer loader that the state of the document is about to be modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 方法来响应组件更改、添加或删除事件，该事件指示设计器将被修改。The method is called in response to a component changing, adding, or removing event which indicates that the designer is about to be modified. 可以通过重写此方法来实现源代码管理。You can implement source code control by overriding this method. 对 的调用并不意味着 属性稍后将设置为 `true`;它仅指示要执行此操作的意图。A call to does not mean that the property will later be set to `true`; it merely indicates an intention to do so.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列化管理器在其主接口上提供 `Properties` 属性，序列化程序可对其进行读取，以便根据特定需求自定义其序列化。The serialization manager provides a `Properties` property on its primary interface that can be read by serializers to customize their serialization to specific needs. 序列化程序检查的属性因所使用的序列化程序类型而异。The properties that are examined by the serializers vary depending on the type of serializer used.

summary.span: 排队设计器的重新加载。

span.span: Queues a reload of the designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设计器加载程序可以调用 方法来请求重新加载设计器。The method can be invoked by the designer loader to request a reload of the designer. 因为重新加载是在空闲时间执行的，所以此方法实际上不会重新加载设计器;它只是将重新加载排队。Because reloads are performed at idle time, this method does not actually reload the designer; it just queues the reload.

summary.span: 发出信号表示已完成依赖加载。

span.span: Signals that a dependent load has finished.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 方法以指示依赖加载操作已完成。The method is called to signal that a dependent loading operation has completed. 对于通过调用已完成的 方法注册的每个进程，调用一次 方法。Call the method once for every process that was registered by calling the method, which has already completed. 如果依赖加载成功，则调用方将 `successful` 参数设置为 `true` 并将空集合或 `null` 传递到 `errorCollection` 参数。If the dependent load succeeds, the caller sets the `successful` parameter to `true` and passes either an empty collection or `null` to the `errorCollection` parameter. 如果依赖加载遇到错误，则调用方将 `successful` 参数设置为 `false` 并将指示失败原因或原因的异常集合传递给 `errorCollection` 参数。If the dependent load encounters errors, the caller sets the `successful` parameter to `false` and passes a collection of exceptions that indicate the reason or reasons for failure to the `errorCollection` parameter.

exception.span: 未添加任何加载依赖项，或者 尚未初始化。

span.span: No load dependencies have been added by , or the has not been initialized.
The has been disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.Reload() cil managed
Function Reload () As Boolean Implements IDesignerLoaderService.Reload

abstract member System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.Reload : unit -> bool override this.System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerLoaderService.Reload : unit -> bool

summary.span: 重新加载设计文档。

span.span: Reloads the design document.

returns.span: 如果接受重新加载请求，则为 ；如果加载程序不允许重新加载，则为 。

span.span: if the reload request is accepted; if the loader does not allow the reload.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 任何对象都可以调用 方法来请求加载程序重新加载设计文档。Any object can call the method to request that the loader reload the design document. 如果加载程序支持重新加载并符合重载，设计器加载程序可以返回 `true`。If the loader supports reloading and complies with the reload, the designer loader can return `true`. 否则，它将返回 `false`，这表示不会发生重新加载。Otherwise, it returns `false`, indicating that the reload will not occur. 调用方不能直接依赖于重新加载发生的情况;设计器加载程序可以将其安排在其他时间进行，也可以尝试重新加载设计器。Callers cannot rely on the reload happening immediately; the designer loader can schedule this for some other time, or it can try to reload the designer at once. 如果无法重新加载设计器，则调用方可以向用户显示一条消息。The caller can display a message to the user if the designer cannot be reloaded.
